name: A Near Death Experience
effect: Play when Agent Fox Mulder is in combat. Assign all damage to Mulder first. After the combat, move Mulder to the Hospital with HEALTH zero. When Mulder leaves that Hospital, permenantly add the following: +1 OCCULT INVESTIGATION, +1 ALIEN INVESTIGATION, +1 SCIENCES, +1 LONG RANGE COMBAT. Once per game you may ask an X-Files' identity without incurring a penalty question. Only one of this card may be in play.

Behavioral: 3
Criminal Investigation: 3
Evidence Collection: 3
Observation: 2
Occult Investigation: 1
Subterfuge: 1

Crc: 3

Once per game, Agent Patterson may attack any Team investigating a Site as if he were an Adversary with the appropriate Activators. If a card is played that Negates him he is placed back into his controller's Field. If he is reduced to zero HEALTH, he is removed from the game.

If the Agent listed Investigates a different Site before this card is negated, reveal the paper with the listed Agent. The Agent must go to the Hospital with zero HEALTH and may not contribute to skill checks this turn. Discard this card.

These three cards can be used to negate any RP card with identical cost except Agents and Sites. This function requires zero CP cost. Discard both the played card and the card used to negate it. Discard this card when all cards underneath have been played.

effect: Adds 2 to one Team's BEHAVIORAL or adds 1 to one Team's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill check.

If played on an Agent with the "Taped Intelligence" Equipment card attached, remove the "Taped Intelligence" card from the game and place this card in your Bureau section. As long as this card is in play, no GOVERNMENT Adversaries may be played on your Agents.

name: You're A Dead Man
